# comfyui-mini

Set up, configure, and run ComfyUIMini (mobile-friendly WebUI) with a local ComfyUI instance; use when the user asks about ComfyUIMini install, config, build, launch, or troubleshooting.

## Use When

- The user asks about ComfyUIMini errors, ports, or workflow import.
